categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Ravtin 2 was a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle serving the Alliance Fleet. The ship was part of Ravtin group which participated in the Skirmish at Outpost D-34. Ravtin 2, along with Ravtin 1 and 3 as well as Tough group, attempted to stop Imperial forces from capturing Onece 3 of Onece group which carried their fellow rebels. Both shuttle groups were unsuccessful and were all destroyed in the process.
These ships only appear in the Hard difficulty on Battle 1 mission 1.
